body:
## Expected Behavior

Expected to see a way to track all workflow starts, including child workflows. However, it seems that `temporal_workflow_start` is sent for non-child workflows, yet `temporal_workflow_completed ` is sent for all workflows.

## Actual Behavior

`temporal_workflow_start` is only sent for a non-child workflow (in this case the sanity workflow from the canary:

```
# curl -s http://localhost:9090/metrics | grep temporal_workflow_start
# HELP temporal_workflow_start temporal_workflow_start counter
# TYPE temporal_workflow_start counter
temporal_workflow_start{Namespace="canary",TaskList="canary_task_queue",WorkflowType="workflow_sanity",temporal_client_name="temporal_go"} 73
```

On the same canary instance you can see all completed workflows are tracked:
```
# curl -s http://localhost:9090/metrics | grep temporal_workflow_completed
# HELP temporal_workflow_completed temporal_workflow_completed counter
# TYPE temporal_workflow_completed counter
temporal_workflow_completed{Namespace="canary",WorkflowType="cronWorkflow",temporal_client_name="temporal_go"} 77
temporal_workflow_completed{Namespace="canary",WorkflowType="workflow_concurrent_execution",temporal_client_name="temporal_go"} 77
temporal_workflow_completed{Namespace="canary",WorkflowType="workflow_echo",temporal_client_name="temporal_go"} 78
temporal_workflow_completed{Namespace="canary",WorkflowType="workflow_localactivity",temporal_client_name="temporal_go"} 78
temporal_workflow_completed{Namespace="canary",WorkflowType="workflow_query",temporal_client_name="temporal_go"} 78
temporal_workflow_completed{Namespace="canary",WorkflowType="workflow_retry",temporal_client_name="temporal_go"} 77
temporal_workflow_completed{Namespace="canary",WorkflowType="workflow_sanity",temporal_client_name="temporal_go"} 77
temporal_workflow_completed{Namespace="canary",WorkflowType="workflow_signal",temporal_client_name="temporal_go"} 78
temporal_workflow_completed{Namespace="canary",WorkflowType="workflow_signal_external",temporal_client_name="temporal_go"} 234
temporal_workflow_completed{Namespace="canary",WorkflowType="workflow_timeout",temporal_client_name="temporal_go"} 78
temporal_workflow_completed{Namespace="canary",WorkflowType="workflow_visibility",temporal_client_name="temporal_go"} 78
```

## Specifications

  - Version: v0.23.0
  - Platform:

comments.body: We don't emit `temporal_workflow_start` anymore. Every API request emits `temporal_request` metrics tagged with API name (i.e. `StartWorkflowexecution` or `SignalWithStartWorkflowExecution`).

title: Go SDK does not send temporal_workflow_start for child workflows
